title: Artificial Intelligence
description: It was the best of times.  It was the worst of times.  Or will it be the worst of times?  I can't remember how the saying goes.  AI's rapid development is taking over the world.  Look out humans.

title: Stark Industries
description: Elon Musk and Jeff Bezos are definitely as rich as Tony Stark... Why aren't they flying around in a suit yet?

title: What is your favorite coding language?
description: Mine is JavaScript.  You are able to accomplish so much with just one language.  Any other challengers?
